content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csvformat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [csvformat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 STRING_DELIMITER='"',
			 FIRST_ROW=2
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raghufs_raghuadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raghufs_raghuadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raghufs@raghuadls.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test.csv3 (
	[Postcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[In Use] nvarchar(4000),
	[Latitude] DECIMAL(9,6),
	[Longitude] DECIMAL(9,6),
	[Easting] bigint,
	[Northing] bigint,
	[Grid Ref] nvarchar(4000),
	[County] nvarchar(4000),
	[District] nvarchar(4000),
	[Ward] nvarchar(4000),
	[District Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Ward Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Country] nvarchar(4000),
	[County Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Constituency] nvarchar(4000),
	[Introduced] nvarchar(4000),
	[Terminated] nvarchar(4000),
	[Parish] nvarchar(4000),
	[National Park] nvarchar(4000),
	[Population] nvarchar(4000),
	[Households] nvarchar(4000),
	[Built up area] nvarchar(4000),
	[Built up sub-division] nvarchar(4000),
	[Lower layer super output area] nvarchar(4000),
	[Rural/urban] nvarchar(4000),
	[Region] nvarchar(4000),
	[Altitude] bigint,
	[London zone] nvarchar(4000),
	[LSOA Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Local authority] nvarchar(4000),
	[MSOA Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Middle layer super output area] nvarchar(4000),
	[Parish Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Census output area] nvarchar(4000),
	[Constituency Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Index of Multiple Deprivation] bigint,
	[Quality] bigint,
	[User Type] bigint,
	[Last updated] nvarchar(4000),
	[Nearest station] nvarchar(4000),
	[Distance to station] float,
	[Postcode area] nvarchar(4000),
	[Postcode district] nvarchar(4000),
	[Police force] nvarchar(4000),
	[Water company] nvarchar(4000),
	[Plus Code] nvarchar(4000),
	[Average Income] nvarchar(4000),
	[Sewage Company] nvarchar(4000),
	[Travel To Work Area] nvarchar(4000),
	[ITL level 2] nvarchar(4000),
	[ITL level 3] nvarchar(4000),
	[UPRNs] nvarchar(4000),
	[Distance to sea] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'postcodes_test.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raghufs_raghuadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [csvformat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM test.csv3
GO
